definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother
meal cooked in a large pot/communal meal/(fig.) system that rewards everyone equally regardless of merit
lit. to eat from the common pot (idiom)/fig. to be rewarded the same, regardless of performance

sentences.english: Even witches appreciate what they bring to a boiling cauldron.
